participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Alex is practical and hands-on, often preferring the company of his cats over people. He has a strong work ethic and takes pride in his construction projects.
participant_1.background: i have 5cats. my cats are very special to me. i enjoy building houses. i am a construction worker.

participant_2.name: Jamie
participant_2.personality: Jamie is creative and spirited, with a passion for animals and a love for colorful environments. She enjoys expressing herself through her interests.
participant_2.background: i have brown curly hair. i will graduate from high school in two years. i am a vegan. i like riding horses. my bedroom is purple and lime green.

content.text: Hey! Do you enjoy building houses?
I am just a construction worker.
